name: Perfume
minidetail: The Aroma of luxury Time to make it yours!
productDescription: This Gold Edition Fragrance from Germany and bottle from Spain ignite the passion within, with the heart laced with spices & aromatic nuances atop fresh bergamot, cool cucumber and mint set against the background of powerful cedar, sweet tonka & musks.
termsandcodition: The images represent actual product though color of the image and product may slightly differ.

name: Carbon Fibre Pen
minidetail: Performance of supercars, in a pen.
productDescription: This writing instrument ushers in modernity, class and opulence made of an exquisite carbon fiber finish is a delight to hold. This priceless possession with black rollerball and silver chrome trim catapults your conceptualization and delivers your decisions precisely.
termsandcodition: The images represent actual product though color of the image and product may slightly differ.

name: BBT Playing Cards
minidetail: Play The Game The Cards. The Friends. The Memories.
productDescription: This playful pouch contains an elegant case of Big Boy Toyz playing cards. The perfect companion for a migratory lifestyle, it features bright red leather and a contrasting lining for a playful look. Cover - Soft Small pouch with BBT monogram engraved on it along with a nice white stitching with a coloured metal button that facilitates access to small products. A handy possession that features multiple usage combining luxury and practicality.
termsandcodition: The images represent actual product though color of the image and product may slightly differ.

ProductDetails.title: Cover
ProductDetails.description: Soft Small pouch BBT monogram engraved & nice white stitching with coloured metal button.

name: Jigsaw
productDescription: The puzzle showcases the night view of our showroom from outside Ever wondered how it was for us to build BBT? Get a glimpse with this 56 piece puzzle set, put all the pieces together to build BBT from scratch.
termsandcodition: The images represent actual product though color of the image and product may slightly differ.

name: Stickers
minidetail: If you love BBT make it stick!
productDescription: The sheer love and affection for the name BBT is duly portrayed with our each sticker in your pack, feel the BBT Love with the latest collection of BBT sticker set. Buy this exclusive set of 12 different and unique stickers packed with love priced at Rs. 349/-.

ProductDetails.title: BBTian Inside (10X3 Inchs)
ProductDetails.description: We strive to achieve customer loyalty. If you find it, Keep it. That’s what our sticker unfolds. Once a BBTian, always a BBTian.

ProductDetails.title: Rocallta (10X3 Inchs)
ProductDetails.description: Style up your way with something fascinating & grand. This is what BBT got it’s accolades for, time and again. Explore and discover the trend with us!

ProductDetails.title: BBT CSR (10X3 Inchs)
ProductDetails.description: We have so much to offer in such simple ways. The art of giving back is what BBT’S foundation lays in. Be Responsible. Be Thoughtful.

ProductDetails.title: BBT Running Strip (12x0.5 Inchs)
ProductDetails.description: Show the world what you are truly made of with just a pinch of simplicity & sassiness. Unpack the elegance. That’s what BBT stands for. Note: We believe that life should be colorful, sizes 12x0.5 Running Strip & 19x1 Running Strip have white options as well.

ProductDetails.description: Show the world what you are truly made of with just a pinch of simplicity & sassiness. Unpack the elegance. That’s what BBT stands for. Note: We believe that life should be colorful, sizes 12x0.5 Running Strip & 19x1 Running Strip have white options as well.

ProductDetails.title: BBT Diamond Shaped (5x5 Inchs)
ProductDetails.description: In matters of style, we flow with the current. In matters of sturdiness, we stand like a rock. Retain your faith in BBT, forever and always.
